title: How to post a letter to BTS - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi sweetie! Yes you can, but as you know that BTS and Big Hit Entertainment have made the decision to no longer accept fan gifts(apart from letters) to be sent on their fanmail address after 30th May 2018. But still yes, you can send a letters but not packages. I will include an address which you can write your letters to if you so desire. TO.BTS (member name) LOANS P.O BOX #1062 DONGHWA BLDG RM.201, 4 WANGSAN-RO, DONGDAEMUN-GU, SEOUL, SOUTH KOREA ZIP: 02582 TEL: (+82) 02-3444-0105 See images below for examples:   Only standard sized envelope (or ordinary envelope for letters) made out of paper can be delivered. Both mail / registered mail can be delivered If you send it in a form other than an envelope, it could be considered as a package and might be returned. I hope this help, Good luck!

I am not the right person to ask this question. However, a similar question has been asked and it has plenty of good answers. Here is the link: Where, how, and what address do you send BTS fan mail with? In short, yes, you can send letters, but not packages. There is an address listed in the top ranked answer which you can write your letters to if you so desire. However, be aware that they receive many, many fan letters and it might be a long time before they read your letter, if they ever do…
